Name: Searcher
Description: Search tool. It provides internet search results

Name: Scraper
Description: Scraper automatically extracts data from websites.

Name: Crawler
Description: Crawler systematically browses the internet to index and retrieve information from websites

Name: Execute code
Description: Code executer run code snippets or entire programs on a remote server

Name: Image to text
Description: Image to text can analyze an image and generate a detailed textual description of its content.

Name: Curracy Converter
Description: Curracy Converter allows you to convert one currency into another

Name: Weather
Description: Weather lets you get whether in a specific area at a particular time

Name: Screenshot
Description: Takes screenshot of site you provide url of

Name: URL shortener
Description: Given a long URL, returns a short link

Name: Translator
Description: Convert text from one language to another when you provide query and target

Name: BlandAi
Description: A tool that connects to any phone number you provide and does your task.
Cost: Bland costs $0.09/minute, only for connected calls, billed to the exact second.

Name: Flux Text to image
Description: Flux text-to-image generation model designed to create high-quality images from textual descriptions
